arm.name: arm
arm.transformationDescription:
Within a matter of moments, a layer of shiny chitin has quickly grown over them and, looking down, [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] [npc.her] new chitin growing to encase [npc.her] hands. As they transform, the joints of [npc.her] fingers take on a segmented appearance, before tapering into sharp points at their tips. This hard chitin then sprouts a fur-like layer of chitinous hairs, which quickly envelops [npc.her] entire arms. [npc.Her] elbows then alarmingly reshape themselves to be ball-jointed, and at [npc.her] shoulders, [npc.her] chitin finished growing so that it sharply transitions into the [npc.skin] that's covering the rest of [npc.her] body.
As the transformation comes to an end, [npc.nameIsFull] left with [style.boldSpider(spider-like arms and hands)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription].
arm.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] [npc.armRows] arms, which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription(true)]. [npc.Her] hands have chitinous, joined fingers that taper into sharp points.
